sentence.text: GPS Navigation download
I want the GPS navigation app to be downloaded .
Does n't show " motorcycle " routing option
Very useful App , especially at the time of soaring fuel prices and ecological concerns .
Disastrous would love to know how to change this routing to any other app
Was simply the best , offline GPS navigation application .
Best geo tracking app , works great for cycling , hiking , kayaking .
I do n't need or want social media connectivity or virtual competition with others in my hiking / cycling app .
I use this app for cycling .
Automatically turns the Bluetooth on even when not using the GPS Navigation device .
The only selling point of using a standalone GPS navigation is that is OZ land on a P license peeps are not allowed to use " screen mirroring " lik Android Auto .
Absolutely ridiculous routing .

You cannot send routing instructions to the Garmin navigator or purchases live services " hello I paid for some extras like speed camera .. anyway I understandI do n't get Foursquare services as well ...?
Cycling 12 v power to the DNX is the only way to restore operation .
Easy and intuitive category creation and management .
I feel that there should be a way of marking cancelled cruises so that they appear in a separate category .
You can additionally add information about the vehicle , eg top speed , height , etc and the routing will take it into account .
Excellent app which I mostly use for finding walking and cycling routes .
It 's mostly accurate and only once took me on a nearly impossible cycling trail involving a river crossing in Portugal !
Five Star Category
However , recently I am unable to find routing calculation .
Last several updates you have declared : Added " View on Map " in Routing screen .
Also , it would be great to be able to share entire favorites collections / categories ...
Until July 2022 Maps.me was the best GPS navigation tool .
Planing cycling / walking routes was always so easy - now it is painful .
This was my favourite travelling app for hiking and cycling and navigation around towns .
Half the screen is taken up by the routing - bring back the simple uncluttered previous version .
But now it is totally useless ; the routing looks buggy , the new UI which covers a bigger part of the screen hiding a part of the map , and no elevation data of the pointed places anymore .
Having a lot of colors for bookmarks is useless , named categories are the way to go .
Point to point routing is now a hustle , it goes back to previous routed points
Literally NOTHING works anymore in the new update for hiking , cycling , etcetera .
Routing is harder and the bookmark icon covers the distance ffs !
Routing is not very good and with my new phone I can't share ( or backup ) the bookmarks unless I send them via bt to my old phone .
Excellent for Cycling and Walking routes
